languages.text: "Вы не представляете, как это тяжело, такой объем, такая ответственность! Поймите, я здесь один! Ну, почти..." {n}Клерк заговорщически шепчет:{/n} "Есть и другой писарь — он работает ночами и вносит ошибки в отчеты!"

"You can't imagine how hard this is — the workload, the responsibility! Please understand: I'm on my own here! Well, almost..." {n}The clerk adds in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "There's another scribe here. He works at night and litters the reports with errors!"
languages.original_text: "Вы не представляете, как это тяжело, такой объем, такая ответственность! Поймите, я здесь один! Ну, почти..." {n}Клерк заговорщически шепчет:{/n} "Есть и другой писарь — он работает ночами и вносит ошибки в отчеты!"

traits.locale_text: "You can't imagine how hard this is. The workload, the responsibility! Please understand, I'm on my own here! Well, almost..." {n}The clerk adds in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "There's another scribe here. He works at night and litters the reports with errors!"

"You can't imagine how hard this is. The workload, the responsibility! Please understand, I'm on my own here! Well, almost..." {n}The clerk adds in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "There's another scribe here. He works at night and litters the reports with errors!"

"You can't imagine how hard this is — the workload, the responsibility! Please understand: I'm on my own here! Well, almost..." {n}The clerk adds in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "There's another scribe here. He works at night and litters the reports with errors!"

"You can't imagine how hard this is — the workload, the responsibility! Please understand: I'm on my own here! Well, almost..." {n}The clerk adds in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "There's another scribe here. He works at night and litters the reports with errors!"

"You can't imagine how hard this is — the workload, the responsibility! Please understand: I'm on my own here! Well, almost..." {n}The clerk adds in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "There's another scribe here. He works at night and litters the reports with errors!"

"You can't imagine how hard this is — the workload, the responsibility! Please understand: I'm on my own here! Well, almost..." {n}The clerk adds in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "There's another scribe here. He works at night and litters the reports with errors!"

languages.text: «No puede imaginarse lo duro que es esto. ¡La carga de trabajo! ¡La responsabilidad! Entiéndame: ¡estoy solo en esto! Bueno, casi...». {n}El funcionario añade en un susurro quedo:{/n} «Hay otro escriba aquí. ¡Trabaja por la noche y me llena los informes de errores!».
languages.original_text: "You can't imagine how hard this is — the workload, the responsibility! Please understand: I'm on my own here! Well, almost..." {n}The clerk adds in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "There's another scribe here. He works at night and litters the reports with errors!"

traits.locale_text: «No puede imaginarse lo duro que es esto. ¡La carga de trabajo! ¡La responsabilidad! Entiéndame: ¡estoy solo en esto! Bueno, casi...». {n}El funcionario añade en un susurro quedo:{/n} «Hay otro escriba aquí. ¡Trabaja por la noche y me llena los informes de errores!».

languages.text: “你根本想象不到这份工作有多难做！那么多的事情，那么重的责任！请你理解，这里只有我一个人！呃，算是只有我一个吧……”{n}眼前的职员以充满阴谋意味的声音耳语道，{/n}“其实还有另一位上晚班的缮写员，但他的报告里到处都是错误！”
languages.original_text: "You can't imagine how hard this is — the workload, the responsibility! Please understand: I'm on my own here! Well, almost..." {n}The clerk adds in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "There's another scribe here. He works at night and litters the reports with errors!"

traits.locale_text: “你根本想象不到这份工作有多难做！那么多的事情，那么重的责任！请你理解，这里只有我一个人！呃，算是只有我一个吧……”{n}眼前的职员以充满阴谋意味的声音耳语道，{/n}“其实还有另一位上晚班的缮写员，但他的报告里到处都是错误！”

languages.text: 「これがどれほどの重労働か、どれほど責任が重いか、あなたには想像もできないでしょう！どうか理解してください。私はここで一人でやっているのです！ほとんど…」{n}事務員は、秘密めいた囁きで付け加える。{/n}「ここに別の書記官がいます。彼は夜働き、間違いだらけの報告書を作成しています！」
languages.original_text: "You can't imagine how hard this is — the workload, the responsibility! Please understand: I'm on my own here! Well, almost..." {n}The clerk adds in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "There's another scribe here. He works at night and litters the reports with errors!"

traits.locale_text: 「これがどれほどの重労働か、どれほど責任が重いか、あなたには想像もできないでしょう！どうか理解してください。私はここで一人でやっているのです！ほとんど…」{n}事務員は、秘密めいた囁きで付け加える。{/n}「ここに別の書記官がいます。彼は夜働き、間違いだらけの報告書を作成しています！」

languages.text: « Vous n'imaginez pas combien c'est difficile... la charge de travail, les responsabilités ! Vous devez me comprendre, je dois tout faire à moi seul ! Enfin, presque... » {n}Le greffier poursuit dans un murmure conspirateur :{/n} « Voyez-vous, un autre greffier me seconde dans ma tâche. Il travaille de nuit, et ses rapports sont truffés d'erreurs ! »
languages.original_text: "You can't imagine how hard this is — the workload, the responsibility! Please understand: I'm on my own here! Well, almost..." {n}The clerk adds in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "There's another scribe here. He works at night and litters the reports with errors!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'imaginez pas combien c'est difficile... la charge de travail, les responsabilités ! Vous devez me comprendre, je dois tout faire à moi seul ! Enfin, presque... » {n}Le greffier poursuit dans un murmure conspirateur :{/n} « Voyez-vous, un autre greffier me seconde dans ma tâche. Il travaille de nuit, et ses rapports sont truffés d'erreurs ! »

languages.text: "İş yükü, sorumluluk... Bunun ne kadar zor olduğunu hayal bile edemezsiniz! Anlayış göstersenize, burada bir başımayım! Sayılırım yani..." {n}Kâtip fısıldayarak ekliyor.{/n} "Burada başka bir kâtip daha var. Geceleri çalışıyor ve raporları hatalarla dolduruyor!"
languages.original_text: "You can't imagine how hard this is — the workload, the responsibility! Please understand: I'm on my own here! Well, almost..." {n}The clerk adds in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "There's another scribe here. He works at night and litters the reports with errors!"

traits.locale_text: "İş yükü, sorumluluk... Bunun ne kadar zor olduğunu hayal bile edemezsiniz! Anlayış göstersenize, burada bir başımayım! Sayılırım yani..." {n}Kâtip fısıldayarak ekliyor.{/n} "Burada başka bir kâtip daha var. Geceleri çalışıyor ve raporları hatalarla dolduruyor!"

languages.text: "Ihr ahnt nicht, wie schwierig das ist ... die Arbeitsbelastung, die Verantwortung! Ihr müsst verstehen: Ich bin hier auf mich gestellt. Na ja, fast ..." {n}Der Schreiber flüstert verschwörerisch:{/n} "Es gibt hier noch einen Schreiber. Er arbeitet nachts und seine Berichte sind voller Fehler!"
languages.original_text: "You can't imagine how hard this is — the workload, the responsibility! Please understand: I'm on my own here! Well, almost..." {n}The clerk adds in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "There's another scribe here. He works at night and litters the reports with errors!"

Na ja, fast ..." {n}Der Schreiber flüstert verschwörerisch:{/n} "Es gibt hier noch einen Schreiber. Er arbeitet nachts und seine Berichte sind voller Fehler!"
